import React from 'react'; import '../App.css'; import './ServiceSection.css'; import { Divider, Header, Icon } from 'semantic-ui-react' function BookingSection() { return (
Rules

Rules & Regulations
 1. Kindly check and confirm available facilities/ services before booking
2. Name of the Guest & Name of the advance payee must be same.
3. Kindly email your advance payment proof to confirm your booking.
4. Kindly carry id proof for checking ( MTDC Rule Requirement)
5. Check in Time 11 am & Check out : 10 am
6. Any damage to property would be charged.
7. Kelshi Beach is purely safe, even so tourist are requested not to venture in deep water for safety purpose.
8. Management won’t be responsible for important/ precious items, kindly take care of your precious item.
9. Any kind of misbehavior wouldn’t be tolerated, guest would be requested to vacant the room in such cases.
​

Amenities

* Attached washrooms with hot water.
* Swimming Pool.
* Air conditioner.
* Barbeque Stand.
* Ample parking place.
* Open balcony to breathe in fresh air.
* Garden to walk around and sync in with nature.

Package Cost

Rs. 1599 Per Person

Package Includes

* Welcome Tea On Arrival
* 1 Night 2 Days Stay on Twin Sharing
* 1 Lunch ( Veg / Non Veg ) , 1 Dinner ( Veg / Non Veg ), 1 Breakfast
* Barbeque Stand
* 1 Evening Bonfire

Food Menu

Breakfast : Aallo Paratha , Curd Or Aaloo Poori , Poha , Egg Bhurji , Tea
Lunch : Dum Aloo , Dal , Mix Veg , Raita , Rice , Chapati , Pickle , Papad, Salad
Dinner : Chicken Dish , Paneer Dish, Dal , Rice, Chapati , Sweet Dish , Pickle, Papad, Salad

Come unwind with us away from home in a home.

); } export default BookingSection;
